MajorClaims.MC1: I prefer to live with a roommate
MajorClaims.MC2: I prefer to live with a roommate, and I always will

Claims.C1: it saves me money, enables me to socialize, and allows me to get help
Claims.C2: many people decide to live alone for various reasons
Claims.C3: it offers me many advantages, such as less spending, more socializing, and more help
Claims.C4: Living with a roommate saves me a lot of money
Claims.C5: living with a roommate also enables me to socialize more easily
Claims.C6: living with a roommate allows me to get help

Premises.P1: If you have roommates, you can split the rent and utilities among them
Premises.P2: you can get more for less
Premises.P3: last year, I shared a room off-campus with my friend, and we decided to split the rent and heating bills into half: I was able to save about fifty dollars for heating, and two hundred dollars for rent monthly
Premises.P4: I was able to save a lot of money by sharing wasted heating and rooms with my friend and splitting the bills
Premises.P5: It is always easier to socialize when you have a lot of people around you
Premises.P6: You can invite your roommates' friends over to your room and have fun together
Premises.P7: one night, my roommate, Millan, brought his friends along
Premises.P8: Even though his friends and I were total strangers to each other, we quickly got to know each other
Premises.P9: We soon found out that everyone loved playing video games
Premises.P10: We played a video game called 'Halo' together all night, and became good friends
Premises.P11: Living with a roommate made socializing much easier for me
Premises.P12: It often is the case that your roommates have the skills or knowledge you need
Premises.P13: When you run into a problem, you can ask your roommates if they can help
Premises.P14: Some of them may have something to offer
Premises.P15: when my computer mysteriously broke down, I dialed up the manufacturer and asked for help
Premises.P16: They failed to give me any useful solutions
Premises.P17: To my surprise, one of my roommates noticed my problems and offered to help
Premises.P18: He was very good with computers, and he managed to fix the problem quickly
